meanings.definition: A network of threadlike filaments in fungi.
meanings.sent1: The myceles of the fungus spread underground to gather nutrients.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the myceles to understand how fungi grow and reproduce.
meanings.sent3: The myceles in the garden had a party and invited all the mushrooms!
meanings.sent4: The myceles intertwined like a complex puzzle, connecting the entire forest.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the myceles looked like delicate strands of lace.
